data.meaning: to reduce in amount, degree, or intensity
kindly, charitable
frank, outspoken, open and sincere

overflowing with enthusiasm or excitement

favoritism shown to relatives or close friends by those in power

habitually complaining, whining

existing or being everywhere, especially at the same time

a departure from what is normal, usual, or expected, typically one that is unwelcome
hostile and aggressive
to surrender, to give up resistance
modest and reserved in manner or behavior
fluent or persuasive in speaking or writing
treating serious issues with deliberately inappropriate humor

deserving or causing public disgrace or shame

to act in an excessively subservient manner

given to lying or deception, untruthful
a subtle difference in or shade of meaning, expression, or sound
annoyingly insensitive or slow to understand
having a narrow outlook, restricted in scope or range
exceedingly idealistic, unrealistic and impractical
not revealing one's thoughts or feelings readily
optimistic, cheerful, hopeful

used as an intensifier, often to qualify a metaphor
decreasing in strength or intensity

to understand fully, to penetrate the meaning of

naive, simplistic, and superficial

most noticeable or important
